message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I suggest a starting price of $85. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your honesty. Considering the value of the product and the competitive market, I would like to propose a price of $75. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the original offer and your counteroffer.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $72. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product and the market price.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I value your input and am open to further discussion. Based on our previous discussions, I propose a price of $73 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise while ensuring a fair return for my efforts.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose a price of $71. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product and the market price.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price closer to your last proposal. Based on our dialogue, I propose a price of $72 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
